ygData.subject: RE: Gix *SPOILER*
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I have just subscribed to this mailing list and already I am enjoying it loads! I just started a wood elf bard and am only 11th level (I usually play a
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I have just subscribed to this mailing list and already I am enjoying it loads!
I just started a wood elf bard and am only 11th level (I usually play a 31st monk) and am on Bristlebane.
In response to Sylly (love the name btw) and his run-in with Gix in WC I have to say that blasted DE SK is one tough sumbitch. I tangled with him playing my monk. My GOD! His Harm Touch didn't do too much -- maybe a 2 bubbles of damage or less, but when he started punching me for 30+ CONSISTENTLY I got a bit worried. He dropped me to around 75 hp's and I had to Feign Death to keep him from killing me. What a CROCK of poo! Eventually, I got my health back and beat the snot out of him, but I had to get major buffed from a cleric and shaman. SHEESH! You'd think I was fighting Vox herself. (or those blasted Dire Wolves)


Acinonyx (stole the name (smirks) and I'll steal the last name too, so Nyah!)
11th Level Bard - Bristlebane

-----Original Message-----
From: James Schuldes [SMTP:jgs@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 1:13 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*

From: James Schuldes <jgs@...>

Me (15) and my Pallidin friend (22) attacked Kisdean Gix DEF in West
Commonlands. He conned green to my friend. I had a dirk and my friend had 2h
combine. Neither one of us hit for more than dmg 2 while Gix was laying
into us for 30 a round. At 2 bubs, we ran to Befallen! Whatever he is
wearing - it has ac like a full set of plate!! Also, he resisted my bellow.
Looks like it's gonna take some co-level casters in addition to some hvy
tanks to get him.

Sylly
Bard of the 15th level
a.k.a. Robo-Bard
camped out somewhere on Innoruuk


-----Original Message-----
From: John Kim [mailto:kim@...]
Sent: Wednesday, July 14, 1999 12:03 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Purity belt... *SPOILER*

From: John Kim <kim@...>

Wish Verant
would put full suits of plate on all those dark elf ancilles
and dragoons I see in Mistmoore, West Commonlands, and
Nektulos. :-)
